desc:
Post 1714
- Set Color: Not Quite Olive
- When you play this, Convert a card in your hand to <:wild:1106237191388143838>
- While this is in a personal status, Whenever you play a <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> , You may play an additional card.
_ _
- For each house bought, convert an extra card to a <:wild:1106237191388143838>
- When a hotel is bought, Move this card to your personal status.
- When a skyscraper is bought, you may play an additional card whenever <:wild:1106237191388143838>, <:rgby:1107167371048788028> , or <:monopoly:1171651746762866799> is played. This stacks with the personal status effect.
